languages.text: {n}Сенешаль придает своему лицу самый суровый вид и зычно провозглашает:{/n} "Гвардеец, перед тобой — Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, волей Императора правитель{mf||ница} миллионов подданных и владетель{mf||ница} множества планет — включая Летус. С этого момента ты будешь выказывать {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости подобающее почтение и беспрекословно выполнишь любой приказ".

{n}Abelard assumes a most stern expression and proclaims vociferously:{/n} "Guardsman, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, by the will of the Emperor the ruler of millions of subjects and the sovereign of many planets, Leethus included! From now on, you will show {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} proper deference and obey any order without question."
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль придает своему лицу самый суровый вид и зычно провозглашает:{/n} "Гвардеец, перед тобой — Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, волей Императора правитель{mf||ница} миллионов подданных и владетель{mf||ница} множества планет — включая Летус. С этого момента ты будешь выказывать {mf|Его|Ее} Светлости подобающее почтение и беспрекословно выполнишь любой приказ".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard assumes a most stern look on his face and proclaims vociferously:{/n} "Guardman, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the ruler of millions of subjects and the sovereign of many planets by the will of the Emperor. Leethus included! From now on you will show {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} proper deference and obey any order without question."

{n}Abelard assumes a most stern expression and proclaims vociferously:{/n} "Guardsman, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the ruler of millions of subjects and the sovereign of many planets by the will of the Emperor, Leethus included! From now on, you will show {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} proper deference and obey any order without question."

{n}Abelard assumes a most stern expression and proclaims vociferously:{/n} "Guardsman, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, the ruler of millions of subjects and the sovereign of many planets by the will of the Emperor, Leethus included! From now on, you will show {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} proper deference and obey any order without question."

{n}Abelard assumes a most stern expression and proclaims vociferously:{/n} "Guardsman, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, by the will of the Emperor the ruler of millions of subjects and the sovereign of many planets, Leethus included! From now on, you will show {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} proper deference and obey any order without question."

{n}Abelard assumes a most stern expression and proclaims vociferously:{/n} "Guardsman, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, by the will of the Emperor the ruler of millions of subjects and the sovereign of many planets, Leethus included! From now on, you will show {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} proper deference and obey any order without question."

languages.text: {n}Abelard verkündet mit feierlicher Miene:{/n} "Gardisten, vor Euch steht {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius, gemäß dem Willen des Imperators {mf|Herrscher|Herrscherin} über Millionen von Untertanen und {mf|Souverän|Souveränin} zahlloser Planeten, einschließlich Leethus!" Von nun an werdet Ihr {mf|Seiner Lordschaft|Ihrer Ladyschaft} angemessenen Respekt erweisen und allen Befehlen widerspruchslos gehorchen."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard assumes a most stern expression and proclaims vociferously:{/n} "Guardsman, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, by the will of the Emperor the ruler of millions of subjects and the sovereign of many planets, Leethus included! From now on, you will show {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} proper deference and obey any order without question."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard verkündet mit feierlicher Miene:{/n} "Gardisten, vor Euch steht {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius, gemäß dem Willen des Imperators {mf|Herrscher|Herrscherin} über Millionen von Untertanen und {mf|Souverän|Souveränin} zahlloser Planeten, einschließlich Leethus!" Von nun an werdet Ihr {mf|Seiner Lordschaft|Ihrer Ladyschaft} angemessenen Respekt erweisen und allen Befehlen widerspruchslos gehorchen."

languages.text: {n}Abélard adopte une expression des plus sévères et proclame d'une voix tonitruante :{/n} « Garde, devant vous se tient {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius, {mf|souverain|souveraine} par la volonté de l'Empereur de millions de sujets et de nombreuses planètes, dont Leethus ! Dorénavant, vous accorderez à Sa Seigneurie la déférence qui lui est due et obéirez à ses ordres sans poser de questions. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard assumes a most stern expression and proclaims vociferously:{/n} "Guardsman, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, by the will of the Emperor the ruler of millions of subjects and the sovereign of many planets, Leethus included! From now on, you will show {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} proper deference and obey any order without question."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard adopte une expression des plus sévères et proclame d'une voix tonitruante :{/n} « Garde, devant vous se tient {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius, {mf|souverain|souveraine} par la volonté de l'Empereur de millions de sujets et de nombreuses planètes, dont Leethus ! Dorénavant, vous accorderez à Sa Seigneurie la déférence qui lui est due et obéirez à ses ordres sans poser de questions. »

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德摆出了极其严厉的表情，高声宣布。{/n}“帝国卫队士兵，听好，你面前的人是行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯！奉帝皇之命，{mf|他|她}是亿万臣民的统治者，也是众多行星的领主，利瑟斯也包括在内！从现在开始，你必须对大人恭恭敬敬，毫无疑问地服从一切命令。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard assumes a most stern expression and proclaims vociferously:{/n} "Guardsman, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, by the will of the Emperor the ruler of millions of subjects and the sovereign of many planets, Leethus included! From now on, you will show {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} proper deference and obey any order without question."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德摆出了极其严厉的表情，高声宣布。{/n}“帝国卫队士兵，听好，你面前的人是行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯！奉帝皇之命，{mf|他|她}是亿万臣民的统治者，也是众多行星的领主，利瑟斯也包括在内！从现在开始，你必须对大人恭恭敬敬，毫无疑问地服从一切命令。”

languages.text: {n}Abelard adopta una expresión severa y proclama a viva voz:{/n} «Guardia, se encuentra ante {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius, que por voluntad del Emperador gobierna a millones de súbditos y numerosos planetas, ¡entre los que se incluye Leethus! De ahora en adelante, ¡se dirigirá a mi{mf|lord|lady} con el debido respeto y obedecerá sus órdenes sin rechistar».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard assumes a most stern expression and proclaims vociferously:{/n} "Guardsman, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, by the will of the Emperor the ruler of millions of subjects and the sovereign of many planets, Leethus included! From now on, you will show {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} proper deference and obey any order without question."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard adopta una expresión severa y proclama a viva voz:{/n} «Guardia, se encuentra ante {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius, que por voluntad del Emperador gobierna a millones de súbditos y numerosos planetas, ¡entre los que se incluye Leethus! De ahora en adelante, ¡se dirigirá a mi{mf|lord|lady} con el debido respeto y obedecerá sus órdenes sin rechistar».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは極めて厳格な表情を浮かべ、声高に宣言した。{/n}「ガーズマンよ、目の前におられるのはローグトレーダー、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス閣下です。皇帝陛下の意志により、数百万の臣民を統べ、リーザスを含む多くの惑星の君主でいらっしゃいます。これからは、閣下に正しい敬意を払い、いかなる命令にも疑問を持たず従うようにしてください」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard assumes a most stern expression and proclaims vociferously:{/n} "Guardsman, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, by the will of the Emperor the ruler of millions of subjects and the sovereign of many planets, Leethus included! From now on, you will show {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} proper deference and obey any order without question."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは極めて厳格な表情を浮かべ、声高に宣言した。{/n}「ガーズマンよ、目の前におられるのはローグトレーダー、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス閣下です。皇帝陛下の意志により、数百万の臣民を統べ、リーザスを含む多くの惑星の君主でいらっしゃいます。これからは、閣下に正しい敬意を払い、いかなる命令にも疑問を持たず従うようにしてください」

languages.text: {n}Abelard, çok sert bir ifade takınıp bağırmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Muhafız, karşında İmparator'un iradesiyle milyonlarca tebaanın efendisi ve Leethus da dâhil olmak üzere birçok gezegenin hükümdarı olan Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius duruyor! Şu andan itibaren {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne gereken saygıyı gösterecek ve her türlü emre sorgusuz sualsiz itaat edeceksin."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard assumes a most stern expression and proclaims vociferously:{/n} "Guardsman, before you stands Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, by the will of the Emperor the ruler of millions of subjects and the sovereign of many planets, Leethus included! From now on, you will show {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} proper deference and obey any order without question."

Şu andan itibaren {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne gereken saygıyı gösterecek ve her türlü emre sorgusuz sualsiz itaat edeceksin."
